sentence.Network_en: Flustered, Durga came to Xizor, asking for help.
sentence.Network_cn: 慌乱之中, 杜尔加找到了西佐, 向他寻求帮助.

PerfectNetExp.abs: durg 药品, durga 杜尔加, durg 药物

means.word_mean: 1. goddess of war; a malevolent aspect of Devi;

auth_sentence.content: In that year, the three recorded Durga Rising.
auth_sentence.res_content: In that year, the three recorded Durga Rising.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In that year, the three recorded Durga Rising.

auth_sentence.content: Durga annihilated the demon Mahishasura after a relentless battle lasting nine days and nights.
auth_sentence.res_content: Durga annihilated the demon Mahishasura after a relentless battle lasting nine days and nights.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Durga annihilated the demon Mahishasura after a relentless battle lasting nine days and nights.

auth_sentence.content: Like vintage wine, Durga Rising has matured beautifully in the years since its original release.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like vintage wine, Durga Rising has matured beautifully in the years since its original release.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like vintage wine, Durga Rising has matured beautifully in the years since its original release.
